column4: I've been hearing about AOL all my life, never seen it or tried it, now that they have the free plans, I called in and I got my aol account --- free, anyone here ever used it?
call, and cancel. Its not worth it.
did I mention aol is free now ?
I heard you, call and cancel. You could have gotten it for free before too.
I know people using it for 3 years for free.
your sound card may not support multiple streams. There is also a wiki entry for specific problems with sound and flash, might want to check that out.
I only have firefox playing audio
read the wiki, there is a work around for this problem.
which wiki page? I've gone through two by now
you can mount it, or you can right click on it, and extract the contents.
this program does not accept direct commands, it does some stuff then prompts for input
i'm looking to do this: echo "public" > file.txt; oraenv < file.txt   in one step
